definitions.body: body-armour ;—abs. [[שִׁרְיוֹן]] 1Sa 17:5, 1Sa 17:38; [[שִׁרְיָ֑ן]] (Ges:§ 29 u) 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33, [[שִׁרְיָ֔ן]] Is 59:17; pl. [[שִׁרְיׁנִים]] Ne 4:10, [[שִׁרְיׁנוֹת]] 2Ch 26:14;—body-armour, perh. more exactly breast-armour, Ne 4:10; with appendages ([[הַדְּבָקִים]]) 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33; c. vb. [[לבשׁ]] 1Sa 17:5, made of scale-like plates ([[קַשְׂקֵשִּׂים]]) of bronze v:1Sa 17:5, named with helmet here, so v:1Sa 17:38, 2Ch 26:14 and (fig.) Is 59:17.—´[[שׂ]]: n.pr. v. [[שׂריון]].
